# UITableView.SelfSizingInvalidation

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe modes for invalidating the size of self-sizing table view cells.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SelfSizingInvalidation
```

## Overview

Use these constants with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableView/selfSizingInvalidation-swift.property] property.

## Constants

- **UITableView.SelfSizingInvalidation.disabled**: A mode that disables self-sizing invalidation.
- **UITableView.SelfSizingInvalidation.enabled**: A mode that enables manual self-sizing invalidation.
- **UITableView.SelfSizingInvalidation.enabledIncludingConstraints**: A mode that enables automatic self-sizing invalidation after Auto Layout changes.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Resizing self-sizing cells

- **selfSizingInvalidation**: The mode that the table view uses for invalidating the size of self-sizing cells.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
